document.p: To open the Internet Access page, click the Internet Access card in the Advanced View .
The Internet Access settings are grouped into the following sections:
document.li1: Connection mode groups the following information:
document.li2:
Current Mode:
Displays how you are connected to the Ethernet.

WAN Connection:
Allows you to (dis)connect the WAN connection.
document.li1: If you are connected via DSL, the PPP connection section will also be available. The PPP connection section groups the following information:
document.li2:
Username
Enter the Internet user name that you received from .

Password
Enter the Internet password that you received from .
